source.cd6bacfc: #In this project we applied the GradientBoostingClassifier and GradientBoostingRegressor to the same breast_cancer dataset and both the model performed well.The GradientBoostingClassifier and GradientBoostingRegressor has given accuracy of 95% and 80% respectively.So with respect to the accuracy we can conclude that GradientBoostingClassifier model is the best.
